title: FS - The Bad News Bear - One Left, A Mom Named Jake
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: FS - The Bad News Bear - One Left, A Mom Named Jake
posts.post_content:
The Papa Bear is none other than Wid Conroy with Bat attractively presented in a PSA 3 holder.  

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10351/conroy-batting-pb[/IMG]

The Mama Bear is the inimitable Jake Atz checking in at the SGC 30 level

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/14586/atz-pb[/IMG]

And the Baby Bear is none other than Prince Hal bearing his Trophy for all to admire.  This card escapes all criteria for grading with more than a touch of paper loss, but as they say it's guaranteed authentic.

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/duplicates/10930/chase-trophy[/IMG]

Take one bear or the trio.

Papa is SOLD
Mama for $32
Baby Hal is SOLD

All prices include shipping.

Papa's gone.  Baby's gone.  Give Jake a chance.

Barely listed these bears will not last long.  Papa left in 34 minutes.;)  Now Baby Hal is gone.  One more chance remains.
Mama Atz and Baby Hal are despondent.  Prices reduced.
